p: We constructed a household socioeconomic index combining a multiple correspondence analysis and a hierarchical cluster analysis ( Supplementary Materials and Methods). Type of housing, housing equipment such as access to drinking water and electricity, presence of a garden, private swimming pool, refrigerator, air conditioning, internet access, mobile phone, car, boat, type of health insurance, household income, and highest educational level were included to determine and characterize the natural groupings of households regarding socioeconomic levels.
